bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.event

Class SViewerListenerSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.event.SViewerListenerSupport

  • public class SViewerListenerSupport
extends Object
    This class can be used to handle sequence selection messages between several sequence viewers.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand
